metadata.title: CVE-2018-17883 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 6.0.x before6.0.12. An attacker could send an e-mail message with a malicious link toan OTRS system or an agent. If a logged-in agent opens this link, it couldcause the execution of JavaScript in the context of OTRS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17883` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.13-1
otrs2 - 6.0.13-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.13-1').
